title: Starmer suggests UK will play role in new Gaza aid air drops
description: His comments come as he faces calls from 221 cross-party MPs for the UK to recognise a Palestinian state.
content: Sir Keir Starmer has suggested that the UK will play a role in dropping aid into Gaza by air after more than a third of MPs signed a letter calling on the government to recognise a Palestinian state.… [+3063 chars]

title: Health alerts come into force ahead of second heatwave
description: The UK could see its hottest day of the year on Monday, as a likely heatwave coincides with Glastonbury and Wimbledon.
content:
Simon King
Those attending Glastonbury Festival have a warm weekend in store
Heat health alerts have come into force across most of England as the country braces for a second summer heatwave.
